items.title: Sandy's Rocket
items.description: A revolutionary rocket designed by Sandy Cheeks to explore outer space.

items.title: Jetpack Prototype
items.description: A high-powered jetpack Sandy created to improve underwater mobility, as seen in 'Prehibernation Week'.

items.title: Underwater Research Station
items.description: An underwater research facility to study marine life in Bikini Bottom.

items.title: Futuristic Lab
items.description: A futuristic laboratory with advanced technology for scientific experiments.

items.title: Tree Dome Ecosystem
items.description: Sandy's iconic glass dome designed to replicate her natural environment, featured in various episodes.

personalInfo.name: Sandy Cheeks
personalInfo.bio: I’m  a scientist from Texas living in a glass dome under the sea in Bikini Bottom. I combine my love for adventure with cutting-edge research to explore the unknown. Known for my intellect and adventurous spirit, I’m always ready to take on the next challenge!
